TEXT.TITLE: SUFFIELD FINANCIAL CORP <SFCP> SELLS STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Suffield Financial Corp said Jon Googel and Benjamin Sisti of Colonial Realty, West Hartford, Conn., purchased 175,900 shares of its stock for 3,416,624. The company said the purchase equals 5.2 pct of its outstanding shares. Reuter
